org.hps.recon.tracking

Class DataTrackerHitDriverTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.hps.recon.tracking.DataTrackerHitDriverTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class DataTrackerHitDriverTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    This class provides a testbed for SVT hit reconstruction on data. Running once with rerunFromFittedHits set false emulates the full recon chain from scratch. Running again with rerunFromFittedHits set true tests whether we can successfully reconstruct from an output LCIO file with the FittedRawTrackerHit collections. Should check that the output StripClusterer_SiTrackerHitStrip1D are the same in both cases. [ DataTrackerHitDriver ] - StripClusterer_SiTrackerHitStrip1D has 56 hits. layer 0, count 9 layer 1, count 9 layer 2, count 3 layer 3, count 5 layer 4, count 7 layer 5, count 9 layer 6, count 2 layer 7, count 4 layer 8, count 1 layer 9, count 2 layer 10, count 1 layer 11, count 1 layer 12, count 3 layer 13, count 0 I could automate this but not worth the effort at this time.
